directions: Preheat oven to 325°. Partially cook the bacon in an ovenproof skillet over low heat for 5 minutes. Do not let the bacon get hard. Transfer to a large bowl, add all the other ingredients, and mix very well. Put the mixture back into the skillet or into a standard 8-inch loaf pan and bake for 1 hour, or until the meat loaf reaches an internal temperature of 150°.
Serve with an assortment of roasted vegetables.
ingredients: 1/4 cup applewood-smoked bacon lardons (3/4 inch sticks)
title: Smoked Cheddar-Jalapeño Ranch Meat Loaf
